knimeNode.name: SQL Extract (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the SQL query from a database port.

intro.p: This node is part of the legacy database framework and will be deprecated at the end of 2022. For more information on how to migrate to the new database framework see the migration section of the database documentation.
This node extracts the SQL query from a database port and creates a flow variable and data table containing the query.

fullDescription.option: The name of the flow variable and table column to be used for the outputs.

ports.inPort: A database port with a connection and a query
ports.outPort: The SQL query as a flow variable
The SQL query as a string cell in a table with 1 row and 1 column.
